name: 2009 Pokemon Japanese Promo Advent Of Arceus 043 Pikachu M Lv.x Holo PSA 10 Gem Mint (0x51d6...7438)
description: RareMint Pokemon Genesis Mystery Pack (0x51d6543072ae4345fe58a3c8e1ec2007578476e17c6acc0b3b3786b063c57438) derived from the human readeable fingerprint of the physical item - which will be revealed at the same time as the NFT itself - using the Keccak256 cryptographic function. This unique identifier serves as a verifiable *Proof of Integrity* to certify that the corresponding physical asset is irrevocably associated to this NFT and vice-versa.
